total.description: The total number of the Scheduled orders.

totalResults.description: The total results of the Scheduled orders.

offset.description: The offset results of the Scheduled orders.

limit.description: The limit results of the Scheduled orders in a page.

items.description: The array of the Scheduled orders by the profile id.

endDate.description: The end date of the Scheduled order.

type.description: The type of the Scheduled order.

version.description: The version of the Scheduled order.

lastScheduledRun.description: The last scheduled run of the user of the Scheduled order.

schedule.description: The schedule of the Scheduled order.

selectedDates.description: The selected dates in a month in year for the Scheduled order.

weeksInMonth.description: The weeks in month of the Scheduled order.

interval.description: The interval in term of number of days of the Scheduled order.

monthsInYear.description: The months in year of the Scheduled order.

daysOfWeek.description: The days of week of the Scheduled order.

occurenceInDay.description: The occurence in day on the Scheduled order.

templateOrderId.description: The template order id Id of the user of the Scheduled order.

profileId.description: The profile Id of the user of the Scheduled order.

templateOrder.description: The template order of the Scheduled order.

state.description: The state of the template order.

name.description: The name of the Scheduled order.

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the user of the Scheduled order.

siteId.description: The site Id of the user of the Scheduled order.

nextScheduledRun.description: The next scheduled run of the Scheduled order.

Id.description: The Id of the Scheduled order.

state.description: The status of the Scheduled order.

startDate.description: The start date of the Scheduled order.

createDate.description: The created date of the Scheduled order.
